item.title: A bash script to check domain expirations
item.description: I have a bad habit, and that's of buying domain names. I have about 20, with several different registrars. If I was smart, I would consolidate them under one registrar, but, even then, checking expirations on the domains is a pain. I usually have autorenew turned on, but I still â€¦
item.dc:creator: mri_rcollins
